about_the_game:
A Tale of Two Lovers store is a visual novel game for adults only. This game is about two young lovers who like to fuck each other after the day's rush. These guys know how to have sex and fuck every day after work!

This game will tell the story of two guys who love to fuck! They fuck every free minute! And this one was no exception. Guys gave the heat and fucked each other to the fullest! What happened next you will see in the game... The whole process will play relaxing music that excites your mind even more!

What awaits you in the game:
Lots of sex animations.
Realistic graphics.
Amazing music.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
